messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Nyarlathotep's typical reaction to challenges?
summoning beings to carry off or otherwise dispose of foes.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much does it cost to summon a member of any race, per 5 POW points the creature possesses?
1 magic point
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Nyarlathotep's damage bonus in his monstrous form?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the cost of using Nyarlathotep's monstrous form?
0 magic points
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Nyarlathotep's build in his monstrous form?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the total magic points Nyarlathotep has in his monstrous form?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to Nyarlathotep's body after he is slain as a human?
The body begins to quake and swell, bursting to release a huge clawed monster.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
In what form is Nyarlathotep difficult to slay?
As a monstrous form
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to Nyarlathotep when he is slain?
He is dispelled
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many claws does Nyarlathotep have per round in his demon form?
At least two
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What attacks can Nyarlathotep use as a monster?
A multitude of appendages, depending on his form
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can Nyarlathotep be slain by normal physical means?
Yes, when in human form
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can slaying Nyarlathotep do?
Slaying dispels him.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage range for fighting as a human?
1D3 or damage as per weapon
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage range for fighting as a monster?
10D6 + damage bonus
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Nyarlathotep's armor class?
None
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to Nyarlathotep when he reaches 0 hit points?
He collapses on the ground
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens after Nyarlathotep collapses?
He changes form to a more monstrous one
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Nyarlathotep's ability to summon monsters?
he can summon monsters at the rate of 1 magic point per 5 POW points the monster has
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does Nyarlathotep lose sanity in human form?
No loss to see his human form
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when Nyogtha is summoned?
An insidious odor begins to penetrate the room, followed by a great wave of iridescent blackness
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Nyogtha reported to inhabit?
underground caverns on Earth
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How is Nyogtha described?
It resembles a blob of living darkness that may throw out black tentacles or pseud
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Nyogtha's possible relationship to Cthulhu?
It may be related to Cthulhu
